resources.string: Tap the countries to complete tasks

This application is a winning project created
during the hackathon organized by Central
Statistical Office of Poland. Original idea by
the team EmojiNotSupportedException:

• Krzysztof Antoniak
• Łukasz Kędziorski
• Marta Mazurkiewicz
We need camera\npermission to track\nthe marker.

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What is GDP?
What is the level of no toilet rate?
What is the unemployment rate in the country?
What is the afforestation rate?
What is the population density?
What is the waste generation rate?
What is the level of internet access by households?
What is GDP per capita?
What is the area?
What is the population?
What is the share of the EU population is in the given country?
What is fertility rate?
What is the share of the renewable energy in the total power consumption?
What is the share of the young adults (18-34) living with their parents?
What is the share of people whose self-evaluated general health condition is bad?
What is the share of people whose self-evaluated general health condition is good?
What is the share of recycled wasted per person?
What is the share of the organic farming?
Frequency of participation in sport activities in the last 12 months
Frequency of participation in cultural(cinema) activities in the last 12 months
Internet purchases by individuals
Individuals - social network activities
Time spent on health-enhancing (non-work-related) aerobic physical activity
